metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: XML Tutorial
Learn XML
XML stands for eXtensible Markup Language.
XML was designed to store and transport data.
content.html: XML was designed to store and transport data.

content.text: XML was designed to be both human- and machine-readable.
content.html: XML was designed to be both human- and machine-readable.

content.code:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<note>
  <to>Tove</to>

<from>Jani</from>

<heading>Reminder</heading>

<body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body>

</note>
content.code_html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<note>
  <to>Tove</to>
  <from>Jani</from>
  <heading>Reminder</heading>
  <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body>
</note>

content.text: Header
Why Study XML?
XML plays an important role in many different IT systems.
content.html: XML plays an important role in many different IT systems.

content.text: XML is often used for distributing data over the Internet.
content.html: XML is often used for distributing data over the Internet.

content.text: It is important (for all types of software developers!) to have a good understanding of XML.
content.html: It is important (for all types of software developers!) to have a good understanding of XML.

content.text: What You Will Learn
This tutorial will give you a solid understanding of:
content.html: This tutorial will give you a solid understanding of:

content.text: Important XML Standards
This tutorial will also dig deep into the following important XML standards:
content.html: This tutorial will also dig deep into the following important XML standards:

content.text: We recommend reading this tutorial, in the sequence listed in the left menu.
content.html: We recommend reading this tutorial, in the sequence listed in the left menu.

content.text: Learn by Examples
Examples are better than 1000 words. Examples are often easier to understand than text explanations.
content.html: Examples are better than 1000 words. Examples are often easier to understand than text explanations.

content.text: This tutorial supplements all explanations with clarifying "Try it Yourself" examples.
content.html: This tutorial supplements all explanations with clarifying "Try it Yourself" examples.
